description_for_human: 输入症状，获取穴位按摩建议和位置图片。帮助你快速找到正确的穴位进行自我保健。
description_for_model: This plugin helps users find acupressure points based on their symptoms. When a user describes pain or discomfort (like headache, back pain, insomnia, anxiety, nausea, neck pain), use this plugin to get recommended acupoints with location images. Call /api/diagnose/{symptom}.json with symptom keywords: headache, insomnia, anxiety, neck, low_back_pain, nausea. Then call /api/images/{code}.json to get acupoint images.
